page.title: 19LOCAL HISTORY.
page.content: { "The Kirkdale Homes"_}One of the new {housing estates}was built on the site of the old{workhouse.}Before social security people who were very poor or who could not look after themselves had to go to the{workhouse.}Even now the area is known as the{Kirkdale {Homes. { "The Old Gaol"_Kirkdale Recreation ground is the site of the local gaol. The last man to be hanged in{Liverpool was hanged there. { "St.Lawrence School"_St.Lawrence {School}is about{113 years old.}It was built on the site of an old market garden. {Minds are now cultivated where once {it was fruit and vegetables!
